credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: New Republic Clothiers: Heraldic Label
description: Spoofing heraldic design, the label features two smiling lions in profile, positioned left and right and facing each other while standing on their hind legs. Their front paws grasp a globe-shaped object displaying map-like shapes. A curved ribbon banner, imprinted New Republic, is unfurled across the top; Clothiers, imprinted across the bottom, completes the company name. The color scheme is buff, royal blue and black.
name: woven label
